ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts to represent treatment of substance abuse with an opioid antagonist medication.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Encounter, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated treatment of substance abuse with an opiate antagonist medication. This is a grouping of ICD10PCS codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
